patterns: What can you do?
What are you capable of?
What do you do?
responses: My name is Unichat, I'm an Admission Chatbot, I answer necessary information about admission requirement in various Nigerian Universities

patterns: How many faculty do we have in Ekiti State University(EKSU)
How many faculty do we have in EKSU
How many faculty do we have in Ekiti State University
responses: We have 10 Faculty in Ekiti State University(EKSU) namely Faculty of Agricultural Sciences, Faculty of Arts, Faculty of Education, Faculty of Engineering, Faculty of Law, Faculty of Management Science, Faculty of Sciences, Faculty of Social Sciences and Faculty Of Multidisciplinary Studies

patterns: How many department do we have in Faculty of Sciences in Ekiti State University(EKSU)
How many department do we have in Sciences in Ekiti State University(EKSU)
responses: We have 13 departments in faculty of Sciences in Ekiti State University(EKSU) namely Computer Science, Biochemistry, Chemistry, Physics, Microbiology, Industrial Chemistry, Geology, Mathematics, Plant Science and Biotechnology, Zoology, Geophysics, Science Laboratory Technology and Statistics

patterns: How many department do we have in Faculty of Agricultural Sciences in Ekiti State University(EKSU)
How many department do we have in Faculty of Agric in Ekiti State University(EKSU)
responses: We have 6 departments in faculty of Agricultural Science in Ekiti State University(EKSU) namely Agricultural Economics and Extension Services, Animal Science, Crop Horticulture and Landscape Design, Soil Resource and Environmental Management, Fishery and Aquaculture Management and Forest Resources and Wildlife Management

patterns: How many department do we have in Faculty of Arts in Ekiti State University(EKSU)
How many department do we have in Arts in Ekiti State University(EKSU)
responses: We have 7 departments in faculty of Arts in Ekiti State University(EKSU) namely English and Literary Studies(ELS), French, History and International Studies, Linguistics and Nigerian Languages, philosophy, Religious Studies and Theatre and Media Arts.

patterns: How many department do we have in Faculty of Education in Ekiti State University(EKSU)
How many department do we have in Education in Ekiti State University(EKSU)
responses: We have 8 departments in faculty of Education in Ekiti State University(EKSU) namely Adult Education and Community Development, Arts and Language Education, Educational Management, Guidance and Counselling, Human Kinetics and Health Education, Science Education, Social Science Education, and Vocational and Technical Education

patterns: How many department do we have in Faculty of Engineering in Ekiti State University(EKSU)
How many department do we have in Engineering in Ekiti State University(EKSU)
responses: We have 4 departments in faculty of Engineering in Ekiti State University(EKSU) namely Civil Engineering, Computer Engineering, Mechanical Engineering and Electrical Engineering

patterns: How many department do we have in Faculty of Law in Ekiti State University(EKSU)
How many department do we have in Law in Ekiti State University(EKSU)
responses: We have 4 departments in faculty of Law in Ekiti State University(EKSU) namely Private and property Law, Public Law, Jurisprudence and International Law and Business and Industrial Law

responses: We have 3 departments in faculty of Management Science in Ekiti State University(EKSU) namely Accounting, Business Administration and Finance

responses: We have 11 Faculty in Ekiti State University(EKSU) namely Faculty of Agricultural Sciences,Faculty of Arts, Faculty of Education, Faculty of Engineering, Faculty of Law, Faculty of Management Science, Faculty of Sciences, Faculty of Social Sciences, Faculty Of Multidisciplinary Studies and College Of Medicine

patterns: What are the requirements to study Computer Science in Ekiti State University(EKSU)
What are the requirements to study Computer Science
What do you need to study Computer Science
What is the JAMB and WAEC requirements for computer science
responses: To study Computer Science in Ekiti State University(EKSU), You need to have 200 in Mathematics ,English, Chemistry and Physics for Jamb and also have at least Credits in five Sciences subjects in WAEC including Mathematics and English
